document_data.name: Tharurr
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tharurr''', or '''Thar's horse''',  was a smaller type of the heavier breed of [[horse]]s that were often used as warhorses or workhorses. They were commonly found throughout [[Damara]], [[Impiltur]], [[the Ride]], and [[Thar]].
document_data.Description: Intelligent and eager to please, these athletic steeds were easily trained and could easily traverse the mountainous terrain of [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.History: These horses were often encountered among the [[ogre]]s of Thar. the breed found increased use among the inhabitants of nearby Realms, including the [[Eraka]]n [[barbarian]] raiders.
